title: Greenhouse effect warms Earth from -15°C to 15°C

content.question: If Earth had no atmosphere, the mean surface temperature would be approximately -15°C. With our present atmosphere, Earth’s mean surface temperature is approximately +15°C. Which of the following is the best explanation for this difference?

choices.label: Reflection of incident solar radiation by clouds
Scattering of visible radiation by aerosols
Absorption of ultraviolet radiation by the ozone layer
Absorption of infrared radiation by atmospheric gases
The breakdown of oxygen molecules in the thermosphere

content.answer: Absorption of infrared radiation by atmospheric gases
